version_description:
New in version 1.2.18:
- Introducing the all new episode "Battle for the Moon": get into space and defy gravity, get past lasers
- New Achievements!
- New "Time Attack Mode": how fast can you clear the game? Compete with the world in this new mode and get to the top of the leaderboard
- Now supports Arabic and Hindi languages
- Many optimisations and bug fixes to enhance your gaming experience

- iPhone X support has been added
- Many optimisations and bug fixes to enhance your gaming experience
